title: Wanna See You

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Ride with a player each night. The two of you will each gain Invincible defense for the night and visit each other, doing nothing.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The first time you're visited by one or more players, one of those players at random becomes your love and you learn their name and role.
- If your love dies, you commit suicide.
- You can't ride with your love until they've visited once more.
- If your love realises that you're your role or you speak with them directly before they've visited you twice more, you commit suicide.
- If your love visits you thrice more, you will both win.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be alive when your love wins the game.

desc:
Post 2306
*All my feelings grow, they overflow, just tearing me away...*
